member.name: P:StardewModdingAPI.Toolkit.Framework.Clients.CompatibilityRepo.RawDataModels.RawModEntry.Name

member.name: P:StardewModdingAPI.Toolkit.Framework.Clients.CompatibilityRepo.RawDataModels.RawModEntry.Id
member.summary: The unique mod ID, as listed in its manifest.json file. If the mod has alternate or former IDs, list them comma-separated after the main one (ideally in latest to oldest order). For very old mods with no ID, use 'none' to disable validation checks.

member.name: P:StardewModdingAPI.Toolkit.Framework.Clients.CompatibilityRepo.RawDataModels.RawModEntry.Nexus
member.summary: The mod's unique ID on Nexus, or null if it has none. This is the number in the mod page's URL.

member.name: P:StardewModdingAPI.Toolkit.Framework.Clients.CompatibilityRepo.RawDataModels.RawModEntry.GitHub
member.summary: The mod's GitHub repository in the form owner/repo, or null if it has none.

member.name: P:StardewModdingAPI.Toolkit.Framework.Clients.CompatibilityRepo.RawDataModels.RawModEntry.Chucklefish
member.summary: The mod's unique ID in the legacy Chucklefish mod repository (if any). This is the value shown in the mod page's URL.

member.name: P:StardewModdingAPI.Toolkit.Framework.Clients.CompatibilityRepo.RawDataModels.RawModEntry.Curse
member.summary: The mod's unique ID on CurseForge (if any). This is the value shown on the mod page next to "Project ID".

member.name: P:StardewModdingAPI.Toolkit.Framework.Clients.CompatibilityRepo.RawDataModels.RawModEntry.ModDrop
member.summary: The mod's unique ID on ModDrop (if any). This is the value shown in the mod page's URL.

member.name: P:StardewModdingAPI.Toolkit.Framework.Clients.CompatibilityRepo.RawDataModels.RawModEntry.Url
member.summary: The arbitrary mod URL, if the mod isn't on a mod site supported by more specific fields like `nexus`. This should be avoided if possible, since this makes cross-referencing much more difficult.

member.name: P:StardewModdingAPI.Toolkit.Framework.Clients.CompatibilityRepo.RawDataModels.RawModEntry.Source
member.summary: An arbitrary source code URL, if not on GitHub. Avoid if possible, since this makes cross-referencing more difficult.

member.name: M:StardewModdingAPI.Toolkit.Framework.GameScanning.GameScanner.Scan
member.summary: Find all valid Stardew Valley install folders.
member.remarks: This checks default game locations, and on Windows checks the Windows registry for GOG/Steam install data. A folder is considered 'valid' if it contains the Stardew Valley executable for the current OS.

member.name: M:StardewModdingAPI.Toolkit.Framework.GameScanning.GameScanner.ScanIncludingInvalid

member.name: P:StardewModdingAPI.Toolkit.Framework.ModData.ModDataModel.Fields
member.summary: The versioned field data.
member.remarks: This maps field names to values. This should be accessed via . Format notes: - Each key consists of a field name prefixed with any combination of version range and Default, separated by pipes (whitespace trimmed). For example, Name will always override the name, Default | Name will only override a blank name, and ~1.1 | Default | Name will override blank names up to version 1.1. - The version format is min~max (where either side can be blank for unbounded), or a single version number. - The field name itself corresponds to a value.
